      • isSoundEnabled

        public boolean isSoundEnabled()
        Gets Sound Check Box Variable (True or False)
        Returns:
        false if is not checked, true otherwise

      • setSoundEnabled

        public void setSoundEnabled(boolean soundEffectsEnabled)
        Sets Sound Check Box Variable and updates preferences
        Parameters:
        soundEffectsEnabled - Boolean to set Sound Check Box

      • isMusicEnabled

        public boolean isMusicEnabled()
        Gets Music Check Box Variable (True or False)
        Returns:
        false if not checked, true otherwise

      • setMusicEnabled

        public void setMusicEnabled(boolean musicEnabled)
        Sets Music Check Box Variable and updates preferences
        Parameters:
        musicEnabled - Boolean to set Music Check Box

      • getMusicVolume

        public float getMusicVolume()
        Gets Music Volume
        Returns:
        Returns music volume or 0.5f as default value

      • setMusicVolume

        public void setMusicVolume(float volume)
        Sets Music Volume and updates preferences
        Parameters:
        volume - value to set the music volume between 0.0f and 1.0f

      • getSoundVolume

        public float getSoundVolume()
        Gets the volume of sounds of the game
        Returns:
        Returns sound volume or 0.5f as default value

      • setSoundVolume

        public void setSoundVolume(float volume)
        Sets sound volume and updates preferences
        Parameters:
        volume - value to set sound volume between 0.0f and 1.0f
